name: Blast Beat
description:
A sense of immersion that overflows! An exhilaration that never stops!Blast Beat is a VR rhythmical action game set in a fantasy world.
With ancient gauntlets, players shall challenge the guardian of each stage.
Blast the mighty guardian’s ranged attacks in rhythm, avoid melee attacks, and wind up the battle with a flashy counterattack!


  • Long Range Attack
Smash standard notes with a punch.
Arrow notes are knock down with a punch that matches in the direction indicated by the arrow.
You are free to use any methods you like to smash the notes such as straight, hook, or even uppercut.
Avoid hitting the obstacles as it will break off your combo and lower your scores.
Making a miss in striking the notes is the same as getting hit by an obstacle.

  • Short Range Attack
The enemy will close in into striking distance and deal melee attack at you.
Getting hit will lower your score and break off your combo, so tried your best to avoid it.

  • Counter Attack
Retaliate against your enemy in a close range set up.
Do you feel like having a calorie-burning workout? Or just a light exercise to refresh yourself. You are free to choose whichever appeal to your current mood for your counterattacks.
